viralPosts.text:
The police killing of Sonya Massey shows how disability, race, and gender converge in deadly encounters‚Äîand why we must reimagine crisis response around care, not control.
Read our new blog: ‚ÄúWhen a Call for Help Becomes Lethal‚Äù at nlawcrdj.medium.com/when-a-call-...

#DisabilityJustice #SonyaMassey
viralPosts.author: crdjustice.bsky.social

viralPosts.text:
We can reduce the number of #Covid and all airborne disease infections this winter by considering the safety of our gatherings.

Hold them online or outdoors. #Ventilate spaces. Keep CO2 levels below 800ppm. Run air purifiers. Wear respirator masks.

#Accessibility #Inclusion @greenparty.org.uk
viralPosts.author: greensagainstcovid.bsky.social

viralPosts.text: Finally, in this opening round of showcased accessible websites, we highlight a standout conference site run by @marcthiele.com + @beyondtellerrand.com www.a11ywebsites.com/showcase/202... #a11y
viralPosts.author: a11ywebsites.com

viralPosts.text:
Today I had to vote on a school bond to *bring local schools into compliance with the ADA." Read that again. 

I was 15 when the ADA passed and my old schools are STILL NOT ACCESSIBLE. I am 50 now, almost 51.

#CripTheVote
viralPosts.author: karriehiggins.bsky.social

viralPosts.text: Electronic machines that *also* produce a paper ballot are good, but using paper ballots only would make voting inaccessible to people who are blind/low vision. #CripTheVote
viralPosts.author: brassclothes.bsky.social

viralPosts.text:
Keep being loud, it works!!! 
#Disabilitysky #CripTheVote

Meanwhile, the CRA‚Äôs CDB backlog is 5‚Äì6 months.

This Thursday November 13th, I will be joining the OZeWAI (an Australian Web Accessibility initiative) on their Ask The Professionals Webinar to talk all about #ARIA, along with Rafal Charlampowicz and Andrew Downie. The session will be moderated by Russ Weakley.
